actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept Saint Paul's Church, Eastchester.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to accept any gift or bequest of any property or structure which comprises Saint Paul's Church Eastchester in Mount Vernon, New York, or any other real or personal property located within a specified square of property which was at any time a part of the old village green now in Mount Vernon. Requires that such property be administered by the Secretary, acting through the National Park Service.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept Saint Paul's Church, Eastchester.
